mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM INDEX_NUM,B.GOODS_BASKET_NUM ,B.GOODS_AMOUNT,B.GOODS_CATEGORY GOODS_CATEGORY, G.GOODS_NAME, (B.GOODS_AMOUNT * G.GOODS_PRICE) ORDER_TCOST, TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER_DATE, G.GOODS_IMAGE , A.ORDER_NUM,C.AORDER_STATE FROM MK_ORDER A INNER JOIN GOODS_BASKET B ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN GOODS G ON B.GOODS_NUM = G.GOODS_NUM INNER JOIN ADMIN_ORDER C ON C.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM WHERE B.MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN_ORDER SET AORDER_STATE = '주문취소' WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
UPDATE ADMIN_ORDER SET AORDER_STATE = '반품요청' WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
mapper.select: select ORDER_NUM, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_DZIPCODE, ORDER_DADD1, ORDER_DADD2, ORDER_DMEMO from MK_ORDER WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
